import React from 'react'; import { FaFire, FaSnowflake, FaCogs, FaBolt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const HeatExchangerPage = () => { const exchangerTypes = [ { icon: , title: "Shell & Tube", description: "Versatile design suitable for high-pressure applications with excellent heat transfer performance." }, { icon: , title: "Plate Heat Exchangers", description: "Compact design with high efficiency, ideal for moderate pressure and temperature applications." }, { icon: , title: "Air-Cooled", description: "Environmental-friendly cooling solution utilizing ambient air for heat rejection." } ]; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Heat Exchanger Design & Engineering

Advanced heat exchanger design and thermal optimization for New Zealand industries, maximizing energy efficiency and sustainability while meeting stringent performance requirements for diverse industrial applications.

{/* Heat Exchanger Overview */}

Thermal Engineering Excellence

Heat exchangers are critical components in chemical processes, enabling efficient heat transfer between fluids while maintaining process safety and product quality. Our designs optimize thermal performance and energy utilization.

From heating and cooling duties to heat recovery systems, we provide comprehensive thermal engineering solutions that reduce energy consumption and operational costs while supporting New Zealand's sustainability objectives.

Design Excellence

  • • Thermal hydraulic analysis
  • • Heat transfer optimization
  • • Pressure drop minimization
  • • Material selection for corrosion resistance
  • • Energy integration studies
  • • Maintenance accessibility design
{/* Exchanger Types */}

Heat Exchanger Types

Optimal thermal solutions for diverse industrial applications

{exchangerTypes.map((exchanger, index) => (
{exchanger.icon}

{exchanger.title}

{exchanger.description}

))}
{/* Applications */}

Industrial Applications

Process Industries

Critical thermal management for chemical, petrochemical, and pharmaceutical processes.

  • • Process heating and cooling
  • • Condenser and reboiler duties
  • • Reactor temperature control
  • • Steam generation

Food & HVAC

Specialized thermal solutions for food processing and building climate control systems.

  • • Pasteurization systems
  • • Refrigeration applications
  • • HVAC systems
  • • Waste heat recovery
{/* Energy Efficiency */}

Energy Optimization

Our heat exchanger designs focus on maximum energy efficiency through advanced thermal analysis, heat integration studies, and sustainable design practices that minimize environmental impact.

); }; export default HeatExchangerPage;
